thread.title: Judge Will Decide Two Media Merger Cases in One

author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Judge Will Decide Two Media Merger Cases in One
text:
When U.S. District Court Judge Richard Leon hears the U.S. governmentâ€™s lawsuit to stop the merger of AT&T and Time Warner next month, he will be deciding not just one media deal but two. Not only can his decision allow one blockbuster merger, but it could also lead to the unwinding of a second.

After the president of the U.S. and the chief executive of AT&T, the person who will most closely watch the case will be Brian Roberts, CEO of Comcast. If Judge Leon approves the deal, Mr. Roberts will likely lob in another... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
